data.question: What is the empirical formula of DTEMOF?
At what temperature does DTEMOF thermally decompose according to thermogravimetric analysis?
What is the crystal system of DTEMOF?
Is the DTEMOF structure determined by single crystal X-ray diffraction analysis?
What method was used for the Le Bail fitting of the PXRD pattern of DTEMOF?
data.answer: DIFFRACplus TOPAS® v4.2 software followed by RIETAN-FP program

data.question: Can DTEMOF be photochemically crushed for guest release?
What happens to DTEMOF upon irradiation with UV light in DMF/MeOH?
data.answer: It is crushed to afford soluble fragments

data.question: Is the photochemical transformation of constituent PyDTEopen to PyDTEclosed in DTEMOF reversible?
What is the estimated destabilization energy caused by photoisomerization of PyDTEopen to PyDTEclosed per unit cell?
Does the photochemical regeneration process of DTEMOF involve both PyDTEopen and PyDTEclosed coexisting?
What is the role of visible light in the regeneration process of DTEMOF?
data.answer: It triggers the isomerization of PyDTEclosed back to PyDTEopen, allowing DTEMOF to regenerate

data.question: What is the maximum temperature up to which DTEMOF is thermally stable?
Is DTEMOF capable of accommodating small molecules in its nanopores?
What is the effect of UV light irradiation on the structure of DTEMOF?
data.answer: It causes the crystalline network to be readily crushed, transforming into a homogeneous blue-colored solution

data.question: Can DTEMOF be used as a nanoporous molecular reservoir for highly efficient, on-demand guest release?
What is the effect of heating as-prepared DTEMOF at 110 °C?
Does the PXRD pattern of DTEMOF change upon exposure to DMF vapor at 20 °C for 5 days?
data.answer: Yes, the original structural integrity of guest-included DTEMOF is recovered

data.question: What is the role of DMF/MeOH in the synthesis of DTEMOF?
data.answer: It acts as a solvent mixture for the reaction of 5-nitroisophthalic acid, PyDTEopen, and Cd(NO3)2·4H2O

data.question: Is the photochemical crushing of DTEMOF selective to UV light?
What is the significance of the photocyclization reaction in the context of DTEMOF?
data.answer: It enables the reversible photochemical crushing and regeneration of DTEMOF, facilitating on-demand guest release
